// Set Attenuation to 5.5dB
Adrv9001SetParam Tx2Attn 5.5

// Disable Boost
Adrv9001SetParam Tx2Boost 0

// Load DMA buffer with matlab generated tone of fs/32
RflanStreamBufPut Tx2 0 0,16384,3196,16069,6270,15137,9102,13623,11585,11585,13623,9102,15137,6270,16069,3196,16384,0,16069,-3196,15137,-6270,13623,-9102,11585,-11585,9102,-13623,6270,-15137,3196,-16069,0,-16384,-3196,-16069,-6270,-15137,-9102,-13623,-11585,-11585,-13623,-9102,-15137,-6270,-16069,-3196,-16384,0,-16069,3196,-15137,6270,-13623,9102,-11585,11585,-9102,13623,-6270,15137,-3196,16069

RflanStreamBufPut Tx2 32 0,16384,3196,16069,6270,15137,9102,13623,11585,11585,13623,9102,15137,6270,16069,3196,16384,0,16069,-3196,15137,-6270,13623,-9102,11585,-11585,9102,-13623,6270,-15137,3196,-16069,0,-16384,-3196,-16069,-6270,-15137,-9102,-13623,-11585,-11585,-13623,-9102,-15137,-6270,-16069,-3196,-16384,0,-16069,3196,-15137,6270,-13623,9102,-11585,11585,-9102,13623,-6270,15137,-3196,16069

RflanStreamBufPut Tx2 64 0,16384,3196,16069,6270,15137,9102,13623,11585,11585,13623,9102,15137,6270,16069,3196,16384,0,16069,-3196,15137,-6270,13623,-9102,11585,-11585,9102,-13623,6270,-15137,3196,-16069,0,-16384,-3196,-16069,-6270,-15137,-9102,-13623,-11585,-11585,-13623,-9102,-15137,-6270,-16069,-3196,-16384,0,-16069,3196,-15137,6270,-13623,9102,-11585,11585,-9102,13623,-6270,15137,-3196,16069

RflanStreamBufPut Tx2 96 0,16384,3196,16069,6270,15137,9102,13623,11585,11585,13623,9102,15137,6270,16069,3196,16384,0,16069,-3196,15137,-6270,13623,-9102,11585,-11585,9102,-13623,6270,-15137,3196,-16069,0,-16384,-3196,-16069,-6270,-15137,-9102,-13623,-11585,-11585,-13623,-9102,-15137,-6270,-16069,-3196,-16384,0,-16069,3196,-15137,6270,-13623,9102,-11585,11585,-9102,13623,-6270,15137,-3196,16069

// Start Cyclic Stream
RflanStreamStart Tx2 1 128

// Enable Transmitter
Adrv9001ToRfEnabled Tx2

// Delay for 20 seconds
DelayMs 20000

// Disable Radio
Adrv9001ToRfPrimed Tx2
